name: market-pulse-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for generating Market Pulse Daily newsletter

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/modules dist/utils && cp -r src/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/src/modules dist/src/utils && cp -r src/modules/* dist/src/modules/ && cp -r src/utils/* dist/src/utils/ && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../deployment.zip .
